name: Name
title: Title
skills_help: These are the skills that we require and search. Pick a few in relation to your abilities.
quirks_help: These are the peculiarity of a team. Pick a few to match your personality.
preferences_help: Your choices will help the system to propose you the most interesting shifts. You can come back and update your preferences, or used the advanced search to explore all shifts.
double_booking_msg: You cannot be in two places at once
shift_full_msg: We already have the maximum number of volunteers
priority_help_duty: Essential shift will be proposed first, then Important, then Normal. Choose normal if unsure.
policy_help_duty: RequireApproval shift do not need lead's validation. users can freely join Public shift. AdminOnly will not be listed
skills_help_team: Choose or add the skills required or wished for this team.
quirks_help_team: These are the peculiarity of a team. Choose or add new.
policy_help_team: Public teams are listed. Private teams are visible to leads only. (not yet implemented). Choose Public if unsure.
location_help_team: The usual location (if one) of your team. Choose or add new.
name_help_team: The name of the team as it is going to be show in the shift listing and team page.
description_help_team: The description of the team as it is going to be show in the shift listing and team page.
name_help_duty: The name of the shift. The name of the team is always going to be prepend to the name of the shift. E.g. TeamName > ShiftName
description_help_duty: The description of this shift. The description of the team will be accessible. No need to repeat.
shifts_help_rota: Add a minimum, maximum and start and end time for each shift in the day. Every day will have the same shifts repeated but you can modify individual shifts later.
project_period_help: Specify your date of arrival on site. Your choice is constrained by number of volunteer already on site.
project_start_help: When do you plan to arrive ? Be on time ! (for strike : leave default if already on site)
project_end_help: When do leave ? (for build : leave default if you stay for the event)
method_error: We hit a problem while executing talking to the server
public_email_help: This is the public email for this unit
associated_project_help: The visibility of this shift is restricted to the users enrolled in this project.
practical_information_help_duty: Write here all practical information specific to this shift (where to meet, what to wear, what to bring, etc.). This is going to be sent to each volunteer before the shift
